article_title: The GOP Could Take Back The Senate, Thanks To The Supreme Court and Harry Reid

article_metadata.author: Cedric Muhammad

og.description: The Supreme Court Case - National Labor Relations Board v. Noel Canning – for which arguments begin today, may provide the second of a three-phase boost to a previously unlikely scenario, Republicans regaining control of the U.S. Senate.  Constitutionally the case has at issue three matters (1) Whether the President’s [...]
